statements: SELECT * FROM property_listings ORDER BY listing_id DESC;
SELECT location, price FROM property_listings WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT listing_id, price, location FROM property_listings WHERE amenities LIKE '%pool%';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM property_listings ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY listing_id DESC
SELECT location, price FROM property_listings WHERE amenities LIKE '%pool%'
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, COUNT(*) AS total_listings FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE price BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY price ASC, listing_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM property_listings ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT location, price FROM property_listings WHERE price > 500000;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM property_listings ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT listing_id, location FROM property_listings WHERE amenities::jsonb @> '{"pool": true}';
SELECT * FROM property_photos WHERE listing_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY listing_id ASC;
SELECT listing_id, location FROM property_listings WHERE amenities->>'pool' = 'true';
SELECT listing_id, location, price FROM property_listings WHERE price BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE location ILIKE '%beach%';
SELECT pl.listing_id, pl.location, pp.photo_url FROM property_listings pl JOIN property_photos pp ON pl.listing_id = pp.listing_id WHERE pl.price > 75000 ORDER BY pl.price ASC, pp.photo_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT location, price FROM property_listings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT type_id, type_name FROM property_types WHERE type_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE price > 500000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, location, price, amenities FROM property_listings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT type_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM property_listings pl JOIN property_types pt ON pl.type_id = pt.type_id GROUP BY type_name HAVING total_count > 2;
SELECT agent_name, contact_number, email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(price) as max_price, MIN(price) as min_price FROM property_listings;
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT location, price FROM property_listings;
SELECT id, amenities FROM property_listings WHERE price > 100000;
SELECT * FROM property_reviews WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT id, review FROM property_reviews ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_listings;
SELECT id, location, price FROM property_listings ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, location, amenities FROM property_listings WHERE location = 'New York' AND amenities->>'pool' = 'yes';
SELECT pl.location, pi.image_url FROM property_listings pl JOIN property_images pi ON pl.id = pi.property_id;
SELECT pa.name, pr.rating, pr.review FROM property_agents pa JOIN property_reviews pr ON pa.id = pr.property_id WHERE pr.rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Properties;
SELECT property_id, location, price FROM Properties WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT location, price, amenities FROM Properties ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT category_name FROM PropertyCategories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Properties;
SELECT location, price FROM Properties WHERE price > 5000;
SELECT * FROM PropertyImages ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, amenities FROM Properties WHERE location LIKE '%beach%' AND amenities IS NOT NULL;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM PropertyReview WHERE rating > 4;
